name: Homage / Altona Split 7"
description:
Two innovative hardcore bands. New songs, sexy vinyl. Available on red and black. First come first serve on the colors. 

002v

name: Heartless 'Self Titled' 12"
description:
WIth the release of their fantastic new single "Lowlife", its clear that Heartless are on top of the hardcore world. Its about time to revisit their self titled debut, and give it a spectacular tangible counterpart.

Vicious screams, massive chorus's, brilliant song writing, and flawless execution are all common form. Heartless have an easily recognizable sound and direction, two characteristics that are missing in most young bands these days. Already an important part of Toronto's hardcore scene, Heartless will only continue to grow and perfect their stunning soundscapes. 

Vinyl is available on two colors, blue and black. You will get the most limited available at the time of order. 

001v

name: Donate!
description: Ablogg strives to deliver exclusive products and host interesting events while keeping moderate prices and low shipping costs. We want to connect Toronto's creative minds, and build a strong, dedicated community. We can always use your help, whether it be donating here, or promoting elsewhere.

options.name: Friends who kiss on the cheek!
